data.title: I Ought to Be in Pictures
data.meta_description: Los Angeles: Twentieth Century-Fox, 1982. Four vintage studio still photographs from the 1982 film. Based on the 1979 play, following a Hollywood screenwriter who abandoned his family 16 years earlier, now pursued by his teenage daughter who desires his help in securing an acting career.Set in Los Angeles. Three 8 x 10.5 inches, with one 8 x 10 inches. Fine. Book #147593
data.text:
Herbert Ross (director)

Neil Simon (play, screenwriter)

Walter Matthau, Ann-Margret, Dinah Manoff (starring)

Los Angeles: Twentieth Century-Fox, 1982. Four vintage studio still photographs from the 1982 film.

Based on the 1979 play, following a Hollywood screenwriter who abandoned his family 16 years earlier, now pursued by his teenage daughter who desires his help in securing an acting career.

Set in Los Angeles.

Three 8 x 10.5 inches, with one 8 x 10 inches. Fine.

[Book #147593]
